strings.Value: This rod increases the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt by the kineticist's simple energy blasts by {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} and by kineticist simple physical blasts by 2d6+2. Composite energy blasts instead deal an additional 4d6 damage, while composite physical blasts deal an additional 4d6+4 damage.

This rod increases the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt by the kineticist's simple energy blasts by {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} and by kineticist simple physical blasts by 3d6+3. Composite energy blasts instead deal an additional 6d6 damage, while composite physical blasts deal an additional 6d6+6 damage.

This rod increases the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt by the kineticist's simple energy blasts by {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}5d6{/g} and by kineticist simple physical blasts by 5d6+5. Composite energy blasts instead deal an additional 10d6 damage, while composite physical blasts deal an additional 10d6+10 damage.

This rod grants its wielder the ability to make kinetic blasts they cast quickened as though using the {g|FeatureQuickenSpell}Quicken Spell{/g} feat, and reduces the burn cost of the Kineticist's kinetic blasts by one burn point. However, the Kineticist cannot gather energy while this rod is in use.

This diadem increases the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt by the kineticist's simple energy blasts by {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}5d6{/g} and by kineticist simple physical blasts by 5d6+5. Composite energy blasts instead deal an additional 10d6 damage, while composite physical blasts deal an additional 10d6+10 damage.
I need to replenish my supplies. (Opens Modded Shop - Added by KineticRod.)
I need to replenish my supplies. (Adds items to and opens Modded Shop - Added by KineticRod.)

If the wearer has the Weapon Finesse {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, this amulet allows her to apply her {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} modifier (in place of her {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier) to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with all {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapon{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}. It also grants a +6 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on attack and damage rolls with unarmed attacks and natural weapons.

This amulet grants its wearer a +6 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attacks{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g}.
